text.author: Ryan Merkley
text.summary: Comedy writers Wayne and Anne discuss the importance of collaboration, community and friendship in the writers' room for a show such as Jimmy Fallon's Late Night, continuing after flop jokes, and trying new ideas with collaborators despite the risk of looking like an idiot.
